CCME Species Sensitivity Data for Boron

Source: R/data.R
boron_data.Rd

Species Sensitivity Data from the Canadian Council of Ministers of the Environment.

boron_data

Format

A tbl data frame:

Chemical

The chemical <chr>.

Species

The species binomial name <chr>.

Concentration

The chemical concentration <dbl>.

Units

The units <chr>.

Group

The taxonomic group <fctr>.

Details

Additional information is available from http://ceqg-rcqe.ccme.ca/download/en/324/.

See also

ccme_data

Examples

head(ccme_data)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 5
#>   Chemical Species                Conc Group Units
#>   <chr>    <chr>                 <dbl> <fct> <chr>
#> 1 Boron    Oncorhynchus mykiss     2.1 Fish  mg/L 
#> 2 Boron    Ictalurus punctatus     2.4 Fish  mg/L 
#> 3 Boron    Micropterus salmoides   4.1 Fish  mg/L 
#> 4 Boron    Brachydanio rerio      10   Fish  mg/L 
#> 5 Boron    Carassius auratus      15.6 Fish  mg/L 
#> 6 Boron    Pimephales promelas    18.3 Fish  mg/L
